title: Ebro In The Morning - BET Hip-Hop Awards + White-Ish Wednesday
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 10/5/2022.

Ebro, Rosenberg, Laura Stylez and the crew are in the studio talking about the BET Hip-Hop Awards, Kanye's nonsense, and White-Ish Wednesday!

All that and more on Ebro In The Morning! 

Subscribe to "Captains & Majors" on iTunes, Spotify, and Amazon. 

iTunes: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/captains-majors-the-journey-to-the-hbcu-ny-football-classic/id1644231857 

Amazon: https://music.amazon.com/podcasts/7ce3df43-baea-467a-9c40-065a397f4b4d/captains-majors---the-journey-to-the-hbcu-ny-football-classic 

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/6ZuO0qvyWoeo3KxNutMxg6?si=50e84457edf147fa
